item.title: Deploying Microservices App on AWS Elastic Container Service
item.description: ❤️ Huge thanks to Nick White for capturing these notes while deploying VPC Setup Log into AWS, then click the Services tab. Within Services, go to VPC: Then select Create VPC: Mimic these settings, but beware of existing IP conflicts. This will create all resources required to get started (public and private subnets, NAT gateway, etc): Now you can select Create VPC. Please allow 5-10 minutes for full creation. After all the resources have provisioned, you should see the success of the workflow: Now, we want to set up VPC peering between this VPC and the PROD VPC.
